thread.title: Home from home in Paris
thread.title_full: Home from home in Paris - Review of Hotel Le Walt, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DDMcGarry
title: Home from home in Paris
text:
I was fortunate to get a very good rate for my one night stay here last week.
My stay was superb from first communication with Alexandre to my check out.
The room was cosy with everything I needed including a balcony and a view of the Eiffel Tower. The bed was very comfortable.
I did battle to work the air conditioner but one of the ladies at the front desk was very patient and explained it to me. This will be my new home from home in Paris.
Thank you.
